Interface UnitRemoteFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:

extends org.openbase.jul.pattern.Factory<UnitRemote,rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood The unit remote factory interface.

                       InterruptedException
        Creates an unit remote out of the given unit id.
